alert.note: Alert for Block Island; Bristol; Eastern Kent; Newport; Washington (Rhode Island) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.headline: High Wind Warning issued February 17 at 3:54PM EST until February 18 at 9:00AM EST by NWS Boston
info.description: ...HIGH WIND WARNING REMAINS IN EFFECT FROM 11 PM THIS EVENING TO 9 AM EST FRIDAY... * WHAT...Southwest winds 30 to 40 mph with gusts up to 65 mph expected. * WHERE...In Massachusetts, Southern Bristol MA, Southern Plymouth MA, Barnstable MA, Dukes MA and Nantucket MA Counties. In Rhode Island, Block Island RI, Newport RI, Washington RI, Eastern Kent RI and Bristol RI Counties. * WHEN...From 11 PM this evening to 9 AM EST Friday. Strongest winds from roughly 3 AM to 8 AM. * IMPACTS...Damaging winds will blow down trees and power lines. Widespread power outages are expected. Travel will be difficult, especially for high profile vehicles. * PRECAUTIONARY/PREPAREDNESS ACTIONS...
info.instruction: People should avoid being outside in forested areas and around trees and branches. If possible, remain in the lower levels of your home during the windstorm, and avoid windows. Use caution if you must drive.

area.areaDesc: Block Island; Bristol; Eastern Kent; Newport; Washington
